EmailTemplate.name: FS Stage before 7 days of Oppty Closed
EmailTemplate.subject: {!Opportunity.Name} Notification of stage before one week
EmailTemplate.textOnly: Hi {!Opportunity.OwnerFullName}, This is a notification for opportunity one week before the closed date This Opportunity for {!Opportunity.Account} is at Stage {!Opportunity.StageName} and the Close Date is one week away. {!Opportunity.Link}
